revisions.rev:
[[Image:Flag of Newfoundland and Labrador.svg|100px|right]] '''Newfoundland and Labrador''' is one of [[Canada]]'s [[Provinces and territories of Canada|provinces]], and has established several provincial symbols.{{cite web | url= http://www.gov.nf.ca/aboutnl/emblem.htm | title= Symbols of Newfoundland and Labrador| author= Government of Newfoundland and Labrador| accessdate=2006-01-16}} ==Official symbols== {|class="wikitable" style="width:80%;" ! !Symbol !Image !Adopted !Remarks |- ! [[Coat of arms]] | [[Coat of Arms of Newfoundland and Labrador]] | | 1 January 1637{{Cite web|url= http://www.heritage.nf.ca/facts3.html | title= Newfoundland and Labrador Heraldry and Flags | accessdate=2008-06-02| author= Newfoundland and Labrador Heritage | year=2008 | month= June}} |Granted by Royal Warrant of [[Charles I of England|King Charles I]] |- ! [[Motto]] |'Quaerite prime Regnum' | | 1637 | Granted with other elements of the coat of arms, from The Gospel According to St. Matthew 6:33 |- ! [[Escutcheon (heraldry)|Escutcheon]] | Escutcheon of Newfoundland and Labrador | [[Image:Arms of Newfoundland and Labrador.svg|92px|center|Shield of Arms of Newfoundland and Labrador]] | 1637 | |- ! [[Flag]] | [[Flag of Newfoundland and Labrador]] | [[Image:Flag of Newfoundland and Labrador.svg|92px|Flag of Newfoundland and Labrador.svg]] | June 6, 1980{{cite web | url= http://www.gov.nf.ca/aboutnl/flag.htm | title= Flag of Newfoundland and Labrador| author= Government of Newfoundland and Labrador| accessdate=2007-04-12}} | |- ! [[Seal (emblem)|Great Seal]] | The Great Seal of Newfoundland | | 1827 | |- ! [[Flower]] | [[Purple pitcher plant]]
''Sarracenia Purpurea'' | [[Image:LIBog 013.jpg|92px|center|Flower:Purple pitcher plant]] | 1954 {{Cite web|url= http://www.heritage.nf.ca/facts4.html | title= Newfoundland and Labrador Provincial Emblems | accessdate=2008-06-02| author= Newfoundland and Labrador Heritage | year=2008 | month= June}} | Found on bogs and marshes around the province |- ! [[Tree]] | [[Black Spruce]]
''Picea Mariana'' | [[Image:Picea mariana.jpg|92px|center|Tree: Black Spruce]] | November 1993 | The most abundant tree in Labrador |- ! [[Bird]] | [[Atlantic Puffin]]
''Fratercula Arctica'' | [[Image:Puffin1.jpg|92px|center|Bird: Atlantic Puffin]] | 1991 | About 95% of North America's puffins breed on Newfoundland and Labrador coasts |- ! [[Mineral]] | [[Labradorite]] | [[Image:Labradorite detail.jpg|92px|center|Gemstone: Labradorite]] | | The mineral was discovered in northern Labrador |- ! [[Tartan]] | Provincial Tartan | [[Image:newfoundland.jpg|center|64px|Tartan of Newfoundland and Labrador]] | 1955 | Green with gold, white, brown and red bands |- ! Game Bird | [[Rock Ptarmigan]]
''Lagopus'' | [[Image:WillowPtarmigan23.jpg|center|92px|Willow Ptarmigan]] | | Found throughout the province |- ! [[Animal]] | [[Newfoundland pony]] | | {{Cite web|url= http://www.heritage.nf.ca/facts5.html | title= Newfoundland and Labrador Animals | accessdate=2008-06-02| author= Newfoundland and Labrador Heritage | year=2008 | month= June}} | |- ! [[Animal]] | [[Newfoundland dog]]
''Labrador Retriever'' | [[Image:Newfoundlanddogstamp.jpg|center|92px|Newfoundland dog]] | | |- ! [[Anthem]] | ''[[Ode to Newfoundland]]'' | | [http://www.heritage.nf.ca/facts2.html The Provincial Anthem] | Written by Governor Sir Cavendish Boyle in 1902 |- ! [ | Provincial logo | | | |- |- ! [[Orders, decorations, and medals of Canada|Orders]] | [[Order of Newfoundland and Labrador]] | [[File:Order Newfoundland Labrador ribbon bar.svg|center|80px]] | 2001 {{Cite web| accessdate= 2009-12-02|month=June | year= 2008| author= Government of Newfoundland| url= http://www.exec.gov.nl.ca/onl/award.html| title= The Order of Newfoundland}} | The Order of Newfoundland and Labrador is the highest honour of the province. The medal bears the shield of Newfoundland and Labrador surmounted by the Crown. The medal is worn with a blue, green, white and gold ribbon. |- |} ==References== {{reflist}} {{Canada topic|Symbols of}} [[Category:Provincial symbols of Newfoundland and Labrador|*]] {{Newfoundland-stub}} [[pl:Symbole kanadyjskiej prowincji Nowa Fundlanda i Labrador]]
